overview: Mandy  forgot her hoodie at her ex-boyfriend Luke's house and she has to go get it. During the trip, her current boyfriend calls her to tell her that he fears that she will see her ex again considering their history together. Her boyfriend was right to worry, as the sexual attraction picks up where it left off when Mandy and Luke meet again.  A young artist who wants to become a star, was playing on street corners before receiving an invitation from the famous DJ Gamble by her assistant Cruella. Arriving at the DJ with her manager, Aidra realizes that the interview with Gamble is turning in a questionable direction.
title: Can't Say No
